title: Skyville Live
overview: CMT has paired with Skyville Live to bring you 10 specials celebrating the music of legendary artists. In each of the 10 specials, you'll get to see new collaborations from some of the biggest artists, past and present, all performed pre-pandemic in front of an intimate studio audience at Skyville Live in Nashville. Favorites in entertainment and music featured in the specials include Cyndi Lauper, Graham Nash, the late Gregg Allman, Emmylou Harris, a salute to Jerry Lee Lewis, Martina McBride and more.
